title: Report: Apple developing new 15-inch MacBook Air that could come in 2023
content:
Apple has new form factors in store for the MacBook Air and entry-level iPad for 2023, according to a new report from Display Supply Chain Consultants. Apple is reportedly planning a 15-inch MacBook Air that could be released in 2023, alongside a version of the entry-level iPad with a slightly larger display.

moreâ€¦

The post Report: Apple developing new 15-inch MacBook Air that could come in 2023 appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple is reportedly developing a 15-inch MacBook Air that could be released as soon as next year. Here's what we know.
